data.name: Last Light - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is the Digital Artbook of Last Light.

The Digital Artbook contains sketches and illustrations that will let you delve into the world of Last Light.

Contents:
- Introduction of the DEVS
- Main Characters and Their Conceptual Sketches
- Other Characters
- Demons and Their Concept Art
- Cut Scene Illustrations
- Background Conceptual Sketches
- Key Visuals

Length: 39 pages
Format: PDF
Language: English, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

Note:
- The Digital Artbook contains spoiler content.
- The Digital Artbook does not contain the images in the Wallpaper Pack.
- The downloaded file will be included in the following folder.
...Steam/steamapps/common/Last Light/Last Light Digital Artbook

data.short_description: This DLC is the Digital Artbook of Last Light.The Digital Artbook contains spoiler content, such as character introductions,thus is recommended to be enjoyed after having played the game.
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
